card_m95gds1ezn0zzyxl.content:
Welcome to this non-linear, card-based writing environment – a space designed to mirror the organic flow of your thoughts while providing structure when you need it.  

- Capture fragmented ideas as individual cards.
- Organize them into structured branches that reflect your thinking.
- Whether you're drafting essays, mapping research, or shaping long-form projects

card_m95geskttdakt9jf.content:
Basic Features

This tool stores all data locally in your browser and allows exporting to plain text. Work with discrete idea cards organized in columns showing hierarchy (parent-child relationships) and parallelism (sibling relationships), where left columns contain broader concepts and right columns contain detailed elaborations.

card_m95gi3yc40oaqq1d.content:
All content you create in this tool is stored exclusively in your browser's local storage. There's no cloud syncing, server storage, or third-party analytics

Edits are automatically saves every time you leave the text area.

card_m95gkrvy6v7g652q.content:
Understand the structures:

- Card: each card represents a single, self-contained idea or piece of information.
- Column: represent the organizational hierarchy - the content flows from left (highest level) to right (more detailed).

card_m95gnhvwwksnlbky.content:
Understand the relationships:

- Horizontal relationships (parent/child) show hierarchical connections where child cards elaborate on parent concepts
- Vertical relationships (siblings) show parallel concepts at the same level detail

card_m95gowoqvkkj7ul3.content:
In-text Edit/Flow

Editing and navigating this tool is fluid: drag-and-drop cards to reorganize ideas or use keyboard shortcuts for efficient movement between cards and columns.

card_m95guu5lnc6e5ud3.content:
Navigation Shortcuts:

Start playing with these shortcuts to navigate and organize your thoughts. Try moving between cards and creating new ones to see how the structure works.

card_m95gwdw7svggvf0w.content:
Basic Navigation:

Alt+Up/Down: Jump directly to previous/next sibling cards
Alt+Left/Right: Move between parent and child cards

card_m95gwdw87xftos02.content:
Creating & Merging Cards:

Ctrl+Enter: Split current card and create new sibling below
Alt+Enter: Split current card and create child in next column

Backspace at start: Merge with previous card
Delete at end: Merge with next card

card_m95gwdw9moyf7bi4.content:
Try This Exercise:

1. Use Alt+Enter to create a child card from this one
2. Type some text in the new child card
3. Use Alt+Left to return to this parent card
4. Use Ctrl+Enter to split this card into two siblings

card_m95gwdw9489ydl39.content:
Advanced Tips:

- Combine shortcuts for faster editing
- Use Alt+Left/Right to explore your document's hierarchy
- Try merging cards after splitting them to understand how content flows

card_m95gz3y6ip1llfoe.content:
Drag-and-Drop:

Drag cards to rearrange ideas and see connections form across columns.

card_m95h0ylnmuxrtuem.content:
Try these actions to explore:

- Click any card to edit
- Drag cards to reorder
- Drag card onto another card to reparenting

card_m95h495g1sj85cjw.content:
AI-Assisted Flow

The AI assistant transforms your writing workflow by intelligently leveraging document structure and context.

card_m95h4t8x3hcmk291.content:
Context Prompts

Context Prompts are set on top of each column with "Prompt" button. They guide all AI actions.

There are two kinds: Global Prompt and Column Prompt.

card_m95h5f5xoyqc8bve.content:
AI on Cards

On each card's header, there are a few AI action buttons.

AI actions on cards leverage context (parent, siblings, children, prompts) to perform specific functions: Continue expands document flow, Expand adds depth, Summarize condenses content, Brainstorm decomposes concepts, and Custom executes tailored instructions.

card_m95h6ff05u7064cw.content:
AI Flow Setup

You need to bring your own keys, and configure them in the left sidebar.

card_m95h71s2lq2l4zu3.content:
Pick a Provider

Choose your preferred OpenAI-compatible provider and enter the required credentials in the sidebar settings.

E.g. https://openrouter.ai/

Create an account and grab the API token.

card_m95h71s4lsdnrsli.content:
Recommended Model Names

For OpenAI: Select 'GPT-4o' from the available models
For OpenRouter: Select 'deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324:free' from the available models

card_m95hc6o6nvai760w.content:
Global Prompt: A general prompt for the entire document, associated with the first column.

This prompt is always attached to all the AI actions.

card_m95hcpz42d0to8j6.content:
Column Prompt: A specific prompt for each columns.

The respective column's prompt is attached depends on your target card resides in.

card_m95hf9s1p6sz7qpr.content: Continue Action ⬇️: Generate the next logical card in sequence, expanding the document flow while maintaining context

card_m95hff8mfiaal8ia.content: Expand Action ↕️: Elaborate on the current card's content by adding depth, examples, or detailed explanations

card_m95hhrsh3x7m7n0g.content:
Practical applications:

- Creating specialized contexts for different document sections
- Maintaining consistent terminology within specific branches
- Applying different writing conventions to distinct content areas
- Enabling focused brainstorming within constrained parameters

card_m95hq0iaivwjjoqt.content: Brainstorm 🧠: Create multiple child cards that systematically decompose the current card's concept

card_m95hq0ig43e22knf.content: Summarize ⏪: Condense the current card and its children into a concise overview while preserving key points

card_m95hq0ij3840nr0q.content: Custom ✨: Execute tailored instructions that modify content, generate variants, or perform specialized analyses

card_m95legqybno6jb3l.content: There is a download button 📤 next to the project title, you can download all the cards in a plain text file anytime.
